item.title: GeoGebra 绘图简介
item.description: .katex-display:has(.tag) .base, .katex-display .base:only-child, .katex-display:has(.base + .newline + .base) .katex-html, .katex-display:has(.base + .base) .katex-html { margin: 0 auto; overflow-x: auto; width: 80%; overflow-y: hidden; } document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() { renderMathInElement(document.body, { delimiters: [ {left: '$$', right: '$$', display: true}, {left: '$', right: '$', display: false}, {left: "\\begin{equation}", right: "\\end{equation}", display: true}, {left: "\\begin{cases}", right: "\\end{cases}", display: true}, {left: "\\begin{pmatrix}", right: "\\end{pmatrix}", display: true}, {left: "\\begin{array}", right: "\\end{array}", display: true}, {left: "
